Speaker: Midna
Text: (This is definitely the right town. Where's the tavern?)
Near the end of the oasis, a sign reads 'The Sandy Sphinx'

Speaker: Midna
Text: (knock knock) Salutations, is this tavern outsiders were directed to gather at?

Speaker: Sasheenhood
Text: Why yes it is! Welcome to the Sandy Sphinx! I'll be right with you, please let me find you a seat.
the barista smiles and shows her inside

Speaker: Gunter
Text: Well Bularia, this is it. Finally some Godsdamned food.

Speaker: Bularia
Text: Oh HELL yeah! I haven't had anything since yesterday!

Speaker: Gunter
Text: Ain't that the truth. Preach it, sister! I'm parched, let's get to it.
The Rowdy pair throw wide the wooden tavern doors.

Speaker: Tiffany
Text: Mmkay there ain't no bloomin' way tha' I missed an enti're town

Speaker: Tiffany
Text: 'SPECIALLY NOT ONE THIS BLOODY COOL! They got all sorts of folks, a pool, and a tavern!

Speaker: Tiffany
Text: when'n the Noine Hells did this get here...?

Speaker: Tiffany
Text: ah, doesn' ma'ah-fock it, that tavern has a gorgeous stage-

Speaker: Tiffany
Text: I cahn' wai' to spread my people's fines' dahnces from it
The free air spirit glides through the opened doors

Speaker: Sasheen
Text: Well, the tavern's all but full, I had better begin the debriefing...
To be Continued.../npress enter or space to replay
